00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00037 #pragma warning ( disable : 4786 )
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #include "itkEuler3DTransform.h"
00041 
00042 #include "itkImage.h"
00043 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00044 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00045 
00046 #include "itkImageMaskSpatialObject.h"
00047 
00048 #include "itkTransformFileReader.h"
00049 #include "itkTransformFactory.h"
00050 #include "btkSliceBySliceTransform.h"
00051 
00052 #include "btkSuperResolutionImageFilter.h"
00053 
00054 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00055 
00056 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00057 {
00058 
00059   try {
00060 
00061   std::vector< std::string > input;
00062   std::vector< std::string > mask;
00063   std::vector< std::string > transform;
00064 
00065   const char *outImage = NULL;
00066   const char *refImage = NULL;
00067 
00068   std::vector< int > x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2;
00069 
00070   unsigned int iter;
00071   float lambda;
00072 
00073   // Parse arguments
00074 
00075   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Resample a set of images using the injection method", ' ', "Unversioned");
00076 
00077   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Low-resolution image file",true,"string",cmd);
00078   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> maskArg("m","mask","low-resolution image mask file",false,"string",cmd);
00079   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> transArg("t","transform","transform file",false,"string",cmd);
00080   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> refArg  ("r","reconstructed","Reconstructed image for initialization. "
00081       "Typically the output of btkImageReconstruction is used." ,true,"","string",cmd);
00082   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outArg  ("o","output","Super resolution output image",true,"","string",cmd);
00083   TCLAP::ValueArg<int> iterArg  ("","iter","Number of iterations (default = 20)",false, 20,"int",cmd);
00084   TCLAP::ValueArg<float> lambdaArg  ("","lambda","Regularization factor (default = 0.1)",false, 0.1,"float",cmd);
00085   TCLAP::SwitchArg  boxcarSwitchArg("","boxcar","A boxcar-shaped PSF is assumed as imaging model"
00086       " (by default a Gaussian-shaped PSF is employed.).",cmd,false);
00087 
00088   // Parse the argv array.
00089   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00090 
00091   input = inputArg.getValue();
00092   mask = maskArg.getValue();
00093   refImage = refArg.getValue().c_str();
00094   outImage = outArg.getValue().c_str();
00095   transform = transArg.getValue();
00096   iter = iterArg.getValue();
00097   lambda = lambdaArg.getValue();
00098 
00099   // typedefs
00100   const   unsigned int    Dimension = 3;
00101   typedef btk::SliceBySliceTransform< double, Dimension > TransformType;
00102   itk::TransformFactory<TransformType>::RegisterTransform();
00103 
00104   typedef float  PixelType;
00105 
00106   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >  ImageType;
00107   typedef ImageType::Pointer                  ImagePointer;
00108   typedef std::vector<ImagePointer>           ImagePointerArray;
00109 
00110   typedef itk::Image< unsigned char, Dimension >  ImageMaskType;
00111   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageMaskType > MaskReaderType;
00112   typedef itk::ImageMaskSpatialObject< Dimension > MaskType;
00113 
00114   typedef ImageType::RegionType               RegionType;
00115   typedef std::vector< RegionType >           RegionArrayType;
00116 
00117   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType >   ImageReaderType;
00118   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >   WriterType;
00119 
00120   typedef itk::TransformFileReader     TransformReaderType;
00121   typedef TransformReaderType::TransformListType * TransformListType;
00122 
00123   typedef btk::SuperResolutionImageFilter< ImageType, ImageType >  ResamplerType;
00124   ResamplerType::Pointer resampler = ResamplerType::New();
00125 
00126   // Filter setup
00127 
00128   unsigned int numberOfImages = input.size();
00129 
00130   ImageType::IndexType  roiIndex;
00131   ImageType::SizeType   roiSize;
00132 
00133   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00134   {
00135     // add image
00136     ImageReaderType::Pointer imageReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00137     imageReader -> SetFileName( input[i].c_str() );
00138     imageReader -> Update();
00139     resampler -> AddInput( imageReader -> GetOutput() );
00140 
00141     // add region
00142     if ( mask.size() > 0 )
00143     {
00144       MaskReaderType::Pointer maskReader = MaskReaderType::New();
00145       maskReader -> SetFileName( mask[i].c_str() );
00146       maskReader -> Update();
00147 
00148       MaskType::Pointer mask = MaskType::New();
00149       mask -> SetImage( maskReader -> GetOutput() );
00150 
00151       resampler -> AddMask( mask );
00152 
00153       RegionType roi = mask -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion();
00154       roiIndex = roi.GetIndex();
00155       roiSize  = roi.GetSize();
00156 
00157     } else
00158         {
00159           roiSize  = imageReader -> GetOutput() -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00160           roiIndex = imageReader -> GetOutput() -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00161         }
00162 
00163     RegionType imageRegion;
00164     imageRegion.SetIndex(roiIndex);
00165     imageRegion.SetSize (roiSize);
00166     resampler -> AddRegion( imageRegion );
00167 
00168 
00169     if (transform.size() > 0)
00170     {
00171 
00172     TransformReaderType::Pointer transformReader = TransformReaderType::New();
00173     transformReader -> SetFileName( transform[i] );
00174     transformReader -> Update();
00175 
00176     TransformListType transforms = transformReader->GetTransformList();
00177     TransformReaderType::TransformListType::const_iterator titr = transforms->begin();
00178     TransformType::Pointer trans = dynamic_cast< TransformType * >( titr->GetPointer() );
00179 
00180     for(unsigned int j=0; j< trans -> GetNumberOfSlices(); j++)
00181       resampler -> SetTransform(i, j, trans -> GetSliceTransform(j) ) ;
00182 
00183     }
00184 
00185   }
00186 
00187   // Set reference image
00188 
00189   ImageReaderType::Pointer refReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00190   refReader -> SetFileName( refImage );
00191   refReader -> Update();
00192 
00193   resampler -> UseReferenceImageOn();
00194   resampler -> SetReferenceImage( refReader -> GetOutput() );
00195   resampler -> SetIterations(iter);
00196   resampler -> SetLambda( lambda );
00197   if ( boxcarSwitchArg.isSet() )
00198     resampler -> SetPSF( ResamplerType::BOXCAR );
00199   resampler -> Update();
00200 
00201   // Write image
00202 
00203   WriterType::Pointer writer =  WriterType::New();
00204   writer -> SetFileName( outImage );
00205   writer -> SetInput( resampler -> GetOutput() );
00206 
00207   if ( strcmp(outImage,"") != 0)
00208   {
00209     std::cout << "Writing " << outImage << " ... ";
00210     writer->Update();
00211     std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00212   }
00213 
00214   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00215   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00216 
00217   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00218 }
